About.About Description: InfectNet is developed by a small team of Computer Science students from the University of Debrecen.

Marianna Szabó.name: Marianna Szabó
Marianna Szabó.info: As a wizard of AI and Java, Marianna spends most of her time developing the business logic behind InfectNet on the backend.

István Lakatos.name: István Lakatos
István Lakatos.info: Passionate Java developer who guarantees the stability of our API. When not implementing the next killer feature, István is writing some great tests, the way every dev should do.

Attila Bagossy.name: Attila Bagossy
Attila Bagossy.info: The only frontend developer and JavaScript enthusiast on the project. Interested in functional programming and all kinds of JS libraries.
